messages: cf2dbe13e7451382dd9a64983bcc20b7 (23:43): beardbar: turn them into butts
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:05): any idea where a good channel might be for locating some UI designers, I have an HTML 5 spec I wrote and I want to see some graphical mockups of the frontend
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (00:05): you might find some in here, but I'm not too sure where the artsy folk hides on irc
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:06): yeah thats where im at, I know where the devs are!
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:06): have you used turntable.fm?
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (00:07): looks like a clean interface
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:07): oh its an html 5 app, with avatars bouncing around
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:07): go in to a room and listen to some music
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:07): and see the avatars if you are bored
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (00:07): they need to work on the code for the front page
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:07): yeah they need some work
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:08): anyways have you seen a room with the avatars bouncing around?
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:09): so I work in the VoIP space, and what I plan to do is using messaging from telephone systems
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:09): to drive an avatar based call center management utility
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:09): based on if they are on the phone agents will show as talking
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:09): when they log off for the day they will walk out of the little office room
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:09): you realise what you're doing right?
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:10): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MS_Chat
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:10): what does ms chat have to do with this
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:11): this is not presence, this is an accurate representation of how a call center is running
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (00:11): 0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b: you just cracked me up ahah
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:11): I'm just relating your idea of avatar based chat interaction to a program that used to do that slapped on top of IRC
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:11): people had comic avatars
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:12): oh I see, I didn't know that.. its more just all of the apps int he call center space
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:12): are endless grid of data and graphs
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:12): and I want to change the way supervisors see their call center activity
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:12): so by showing people doing real shit, since nowadays half these call centers are off shored
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:12): people would have much more of an idea what really happens, moreso then just numbers on paper
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:13): anyways I guess I will continue on for my search for artsy designerish people! :D
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:14): hm, true, but the cynic in me goes "hilarious, now Sandeep from Goa not only sounds like a guy from Kansas, but has an avatar that pretends he is one"
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:14): well its internal for the people who run the call center, its for management purposes
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:14): not from the customer perspective
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:15): I install Cisco Call Centers for a living
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:15): this would be an addon to Cisco and Avaya Genesys, Aspect
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:15): the phone system guys
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:15): ahh, I see.
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:16): they would be like i wonder what my agents are doing
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:16): and log on and see this realtime dashboard with people moving around a bit
ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7 (00:16): and be like oh shit, joe is a lazy piece of shit
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:17): the heisenberg quandry
7a205621b91e4878465075e964d2b1e8 (00:17): ca857b08294c2e90be782d2865b7d3a7: you are using your powers for ev0l!
0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (00:18): you can never measure both your agent's productivity and their current activity at the same time.
